DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify safety immunogenicity trivalent seasonal influenza vaccine strain composition accord World Health Organization ( WHO ) /European Union ( EU ) recommendation 2009/2010 season .
DOC.brief_title: Adult Safety Study 2009/2010 Seasonal Influenza Vaccine
DOC.criteria: Subject 18 59 year age , inclusive , time screen Subject give write informed consent prior study entry Subject generally healthy , determine investigator 's clinical judgment collection medical history performance physical examination , investigator would hesitate provide routine influenza immunization subject course routine medical practice Subject agree keep daily record symptom duration study If female childbearing potential , subject present negative urine pregnancy test immediately prior vaccination Study Day 1 agrees employ adequate birth control measure duration study Subject willing able comply requirement protocol Subject history severe allergic reaction anaphylaxis Subject oral temperature > = 37.5°C day vaccination study Subject dermatologic condition tattoo , may interfere injection site reaction rating Subject receive live vaccine within 4 week inactivate subunit vaccine within 2 week study entry Subject vaccinate seasonal influenza vaccine 2009/2010 season Subject currently history significant neurological , cardiovascular , pulmonary ( include asthma ) , hepatic , metabolic , rheumatic , autoimmune , hematological renal disorder Subject inherit acquire immunodeficiency Subject disease currently undergoing form treatment undergoing form treatment within 30 day prior study entry expect influence immune response . Such treatment include , limited , systemic high dose inhale ( > 800 μg/day beclomethasone dipropionate equivalent ) corticosteroid , radiation treatment immunosuppressive cytotoxic drug . Subject functional surgical asplenia Subject know suspect problem alcohol drug abuse Subject member team conduct study dependent relationship one study team member . Dependent relationship include close relative ( ie. , child , partner/spouse , sibling , parent ) well employee investigator site personnel conduct study . If female , subject pregnant lactating time study enrollment Subject participate another clinical study involve investigational product ( IP ) investigational device within 30 day prior study enrollment schedule participate another clinical study involve IP investigational device course study
